mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.nick_name AS "nickName", a.account_no AS "accountNo", a.password AS "password", a.amount AS "amount", a.biz_store_id AS "bizStoreId", a.birthday AS "birthday", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO biz_member( id, nick_name, account_no, password, amount, biz_store_id, birthday, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{nickName}, #{accountNo}, #{password}, #{amount}, #{bizStoreId}, #{birthday}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE biz_member SET nick_name = #{nickName}, account_no = #{accountNo}, password = #{password}, amount = #{amount}, biz_store_id = #{bizStoreId}, birthday = #{birthday}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
